name: Don't Let Them Fall
description:
Collect as many coins as possible, without letting them fall and then the combo points will grow allowing you to accumulate more and more points. Avoid various dangers. Collect bonuses and crystals to open other falling objects! Being on the leaderboard, challenge your friends.

Features:
- Endless game mode;
- Simple control of one touch;
- GooglePlay leaderboard;
- Play for free;

No WIFI? No problem! In the game you can play offline.
Integration with Google Play. Casual game, simple game..

Have problems or have suggestions?
Write to us at: slaffski@gmail.com
